mapper.sql: ID, ND, XYDM, ZQR, ZWR, ZZQZL, ZZQSE, LXZWQX, BZQJ, BZFS, BZDBFW, HCRW_ID

insert into T_NB_BD_DWDB (ID, ND, XYDM, ZQR, ZWR, ZZQZL, ZZQSE, LXZWQX, BZQJ, BZFS, BZDBFW, HCRW_ID, SJLY) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzqzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{zzqse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{lxzwqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{bzdbfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{hcrwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},2)

update T_NB_DWDB
ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC},
XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ZQR = #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR},

where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update T_NB_DWDB set ND = #{nd,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, XYDM = #{xydm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZQR = #{zqr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZWR = #{zwr,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZQZL = #{zzqzl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ZZQSE = #{zzqse,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, LXZWQX = #{lxzwqx,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZQJ = #{bzqj,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZFS = #{bzfs,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, BZDBFW = #{bzdbfw,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, HCRW_ID = #{hcrwId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select 'false' as QUERYID,
from T_NB_BD_DWDB where HCRW_ID = #{taskId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} AND SJLY = 1
